profile:
At Reliance, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are synonymous for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

Reliance Home Comfort has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services for over 40 years. Specializing in furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing, we provide our customers with peace of mind and are with you every step of the way. When you choose Reliance, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.7 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. With one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada, we respond to over 500,000 service calls each year. 
After all, we believe you are investing in much more than home comfort equipment, you’re investing in a relationship and your satisfaction is our top priority.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
ECM, even though started in 2017 has many years of experience in residential, commercial and industrial heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration (HVACR). Founder Keith Didychuk, well known for his unmatched problem-solving skills and ability to find the route of the problems, started ECM to give more economical solutions to homeowners and business owners for their HVACR needs. Keith started full time in the trade-in 2001. He has never stopped learning and earned his Certified Energy Managers (CEM) designation from the Association of Energy Engineers and continues upgrading and adding skills to his portfolio.

Keith is passionate about his job, the environment, and humanity. With these at the forefront, Keith is not only great at his job but also helps people afford the essentials for getting by day to day; which makes ECM your truly home town HVAC contractor.

With Keith looking at ways to help the world and not leaving his home town without someone they can truly trust to be fair and honest, Keith brought Colin McEachern on to look after the HVAC side of things. Colin, tired of being a number to bigger companies, was looking for a way to grow. And what better way than to invest in your own future? Both Keith and Colin saw a win, win situation for themselves, and started working together in the fall of 2019.

Colin being young and eager, came on with ECM to take over the residential and light commercial side of ECM and grow it to better serve our home towns. Colin shares the home town contractor feeling and passion to help the people as Keith does.

****

You can also check out our Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/ECMkingston/

profile:
To have a job done right, you ask for the experts. At Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston, we’re committed to performing quality HVAC repairs and installations. We even put it in writing. Our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee demonstrates our commitment to upholding the highest level of heating and air conditioning services in the industry. Moreover, Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston repairs, sells and installs more heating and cooling systems than any other HVAC repair and service company in all of North America – more people trust us with their home comfort, so you can be sure your home is in good hands.

Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston will take care of everything related to your home’s comfort. Whether your air conditioner or furnace breaks at the moment you need it most or you’re in search of indoor air quality solutions that meet the highest EPA and ENERGY STAR® standards, you can trust our Kingston team. We’re experts in heating and cooling, and superior service is what we do best.

We know it takes a lot to keep your home comfortable. Whether it’s deciding to replace your furnace to scheduling maintenance or furnace repairs, Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston has got you covered across the board. Seriously. Sure, service may be part of our name, but it’s not our sole expertise. Just read through all our categories below to find out just how well your home heating needs can be taken care of when you call in the experts. 

We understand your comfort needs are top priority… and that everyone’s desires are different, which is why we’ve got you covered from the get go. Whether you looking for a new air conditioner or just need yours tuned up for the long haul, Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning of Kingston is here to provide all of your HVAC needs. Our experts are ready to help redefine the word comfort for you and your home. See all of our air conditioning services below and find the best fit for your needs, then schedule an appointment so we can get you back to relaxing in no time.
If you're involved in facility management, Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston brings you the quality, dependability, and cost savings you want for your operations. No other company knows the HVAC industry like we do. With more than 90 heating and air conditioning service centers across North America, we offer the highest level of knowledge and experience to service and provide solutions to your commercial heating and cooling needs. With NATE-trained technicians, innovative energy solutions, 24/7/365 live customer service and more, we will exceed your expectations as experts in the HVAC industry.
products: When you think about it, replacing your old furnace or air handler sounds like a no-brainer. You’ve made more than your share of heating repair calls recently, and you want consistent heat and a more energy efficient system. It’s not worth throwing all your dollars into our furnace repair service (but we’re not complaining) when you could have a new furnace or air handler that will save you money in the long run. As a prior Service Experts customer in Kingston, you already know the benefits of working with us. However, we don’t only offer HVAC services – Service Experts also carries a variety of heating equipment. Even better, our professionals will work with you to determine the best product for your home, your needs and your budget. That’s fewer worries for you and more comfort for your family. We offer a whole range of Lennox® furnaces and air handlers in Kingston. Discover more on our website or by scheduling a free appointment with one of our experts.
services:
Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning furnace repair technicians in Kingston are prepared for all types of heating repair, whether your furnace is electric, gas, duel fuel, heat pump, oil or a boiler.

COMMERCIAL SERVICES AVAILABLE

AC REPAIR SERVICE
AC Repair doesn’t have to be a headache. Sure, you’re probably not in your happiest moment when you need us, but rest assured, we’re standing by to take care of any AC repair issue that pops up. We’re certified to service all brands of air conditioners, so you know you’ll be getting the greatest AC repair around. And with a written 100% Satisfaction Guarantee you have nothing to lose.

NEW AIR CONDITIONERS
The time has come to finally take the next step to updating your home’s air conditioner. Upgrading your current system is actually more affordable than you may think, so why wait? Scheduling a FREE estimate is easy too. Just fill in your information and we’ll work with you to make your home cool, energy efficient, and the most comfortable it has ever been.

AIR CONDITIONING MAINTENANCE
So you’ve got your thermostat programmed perfectly but you’re still not satisfied with your energy bill every month? Much like cars, AC maintenance is vital to ensure your home is running at its highest efficiency. We’ve made four service plans to meet your exact AC maintenance need, in addition to your budget.

SOLAR AIR CONDITIONERS
We won’t inundate you with a bunch of “green” terminology, but you should know that solar air conditioning is a lot more realistic and practical than you make think. We have countless solar options that can take your home to the next level of efficiency and also provide your wallet with a little more green as well. While you shouldn’t stare into the sun, you should definitely take a look into taking advantage of all the power it delivers.

AIR CONDITIONERS
We all like being comfortable. Keeping your home cool plays a large part in your family’s comfort in the heat of the summer and we’re here to help ensure you preserve the level of comfort your want. Choosing one of our ENERGY STAR® qualified air conditioners will keep your home the perfect temperature while giving you a quiet and efficient system that helps decrease your carbon footprint at the same time.

FURNACE REPAIR SERVICE
Whether your unit stops working in the middle of your morning or the middle of the night, we can send out our experts to fix your furnace in no time. Our NATE-certified technicians have earned the most prestigious training and certification in the industry, so they’ll do the job right the first time. Our expert professionals at Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston are trained to service any kind of furnace or boiler, so you can be sure you’ll get the best service in the area.

FURNACE SALES & INSTALLATION
Replacing your furnace is quite the task. Do you know where to begin? Don’t worry. Our expert heating and cooling consultants will help you figure out which unit is best for your specific home based on the size of your home, your family’s air quality preferences, financing budget and your desired energy efficiency. One of our experts will work with you throughout the whole process from selecting the best system and financing solution, to executing an expert equipment installation when it arrives.

FURNACE & AIR HANDLERS
If you’re in the market for a replacement furnace or air handler, look no further than Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning in Kingston. We offer a wide range of gas furnaces, oil furnaces, air handlers, boilers and garage heaters – and all our products rate well for efficiency, low noise levels and, of course, reliable performance. Look through our full range of products on the Furnaces & Air Handlers page.

FURNACE MAINTENANCE
You can’t always prevent your furnace from breaking down, but you can help thwart it with routine furnace maintenance visits. Our expert furnace tune-ups and PLUS service plans actually save in two ways. First, a well-maintained heating system will perform more efficiently and uses less energy, which helps the environment. Second, proper maintenance means fewer expensive repairs. We don’t know about you, but we have a list of things we’d rather spend money for. And with lower energy bills, we can!
specialities: It’s time to consider taking steps to increase the quality of the air you breathe indoors. Doing so can: Maintain your health. That’s right. And actually, 50% of all illnesses are either caused or aggravated by polluted indoor air according to the American College of Allergists. Cut down your energy consumption. How? Cleaner air improves how efficient your heat and AC works. Can you say “smaller carbon footprint” and “lower costs over time?” Protect your investment. Better air quality keeps heating and air conditioning components from corrosion, microbials, dirt and debris. If you’re a DIYer, you can certainly take steps to bump the air quality in your home. But even the most mechanically-minded homeowners can’t do it all… and that’s where Service Experts Heating & Air Conditioning comes in. With a complete offering of indoor air quality equipment choices, knowledge and expert service—for all makes and models, 24 hours a day—you can take that deep breath indoors and know it’s the highest indoor air quality possible.

profile:
ACHIEVE YEAR ROUND COMFORT

Established in 1991

Indoor Climatization control has grown in leaps and bounds to achieve year round indoor comfort.

Glen Air provides a full range of residential and commercial heating, cooling and ventilation systems and solutions. 

Our number one goal is to supply Kingston & Area’s residents and businesses with the highest quality of air conditioning & heating service and products. 

Whether it be a simple furnace repair, or a large air conditioning installation, our highly trained staff will meet and exceed your expectations. 

We strive on customer satisfaction, and will do anything in our power to make sure you receive individual attention. 

We have hundreds of satisfied customers in the residential and commercial markets and look forward to serving your needs.

Call us now - 613-386-7004

profile:
Exclusive Cooling Ltd. is an independently owned H.V.A.C. business which has been in operation in Kingston, Ontario since 1979. It is our goal to ensure your system is trouble free and operating at its peak energy efficiency. 

Our commitment: We're not comfortable until you are! 

As a Premier Lennox Dealer, we are proud to offer exceptional commercial & residential products and professional services to businesses and residents across Southeastern Ontario. Our factory trained technicians are extremely knowledgeable about the latest innovations and techniques in the fields of refrigeration, heating, air conditioning and indoor air quality. 

Exclusive Cooling Ltd. offers 24 hour emergency service as well as extended warranties and planned service contracts.

Contact us today for a free estimate!
